medical_history.chief_complaint: Mid-epigastric and right upper quadrant abdominal pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient experienced intense RUQ pain starting at 10pm last night, with no associated nausea, vomiting, fever, or chills. The patient has had 5 episodes of abdominal pain in the past month, with a previous similar episode that did not show gallstones on MRI.
medical_history.past_medical_history: GERD, esophagitis, hiatal hernia, nephrolithiasis, hyperlipidemia, history of prostate resection ___ years ago.
